spell_tooltip.description: Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 72,980 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Obliterate hits up to 2 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 16.1 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by 70% for 4 sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.

While active, your movement speed cannot be reduced below 170%.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 124,251 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 379,961 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 290,071 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 209,045 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 39,310 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 477,821 Frost damage over 12 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate deal Frost damage and critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases Frost Strike damage by 20%.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate deals 15% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within 40 yards in front of you for 71,364 Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you 8% Mastery for 15 sec, up to 40%.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 655,260 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 40,850 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 184,453 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
While Pillar of Frost is active your auto-attack critical strikes increase its duration by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 444,530 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 44,371 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 172,934 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Frost Fever deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Frost Fever.

Rime empowered Howling Blast deals 30% increased damage to its main target, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants Killing Machine.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 791,586 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 267,457 Shadowfrost damage and applies Frost Fever. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 72,214 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.

A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 208,180 Physical damage.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.

The first scythe strikes your target for 786,150 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 265,017 Shadowfrost damage and applies Frost Fever. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 16.1 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.

Strike an enemy for 79,892 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 366,737 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 379,022 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 58,405 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec.

Smash the target, dealing 66,038 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 78,918. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 73,517 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 80,384 health from the target over 12 sec.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 78,918. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Vampiric Blood's healing and absorb amount is increased by 10% and duration by 4 sec.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
Each charge of Bone Shield increases your maximum health by 1%.

Summons a rune weapon for 8 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 6% Versatility for 6 sec.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 20% for 4 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 81,409 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

Generates 2 Runes.

Parrying an attack grants you a charge of Bloodied Blade, increasing your Strength by 0.5%, up to 4.0% for 15 sec.

At 8 stacks, your next parry consumes all charges to unleash a Heart Strike at 300% effectiveness, and increases your Strength by 10% for 6 sec.
You deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 6,899 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown on Vampiric Blood by 2.0 sec per 10 Runic Power spent.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 29,116 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
After Vampiric Blood expires, you absorb damage equal to 5 times the damage your Blood Plague dealt during Vampiric Blood.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 174,984 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Frost Fever deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Frost Fever.

Rime empowered Howling Blast deals 30% increased damage to its main target, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

When you apply Reaper's Mark, the cooldown of Soul Reaper is reset, your next Soul Reaper costs no runes, and it explodes on the target regardless of their health.

Soul Reaper damage is increased by 20%.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 776,772 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 259,837 Shadowfrost damage and applies Frost Fever. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
